title: Steno helps attorneys find the critical insights in legal transcripts with Claude \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Steno helps attorneys find the critical insights in legal transcripts with Claude \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Steno uses Claude 3 Opus to streamline deposition preparation for attorneys. Claude helps lawyers quickly find relevant information across vast transcripts, saving them from manually gathering and reading thousands of pages at a time.
